recipe:
Caramel Frappuccino
Add hazelnut syrup (1 pump for a tall, 1.5 pumps for grande, 2 pumps for venti)
Add java chips
Whip cream blended in
Coat the cup with caramel sauce
Top with mocha drizzle

Milk (of your choice) to the 1st line
Orange Mango or Valencia Orange Refresher Juice to the 2nd line
Add classic syrup (2 pumps tall, 3 pumps grande, 4 pumps venti)
Add creme base (2 pumps tall, 3 pumps grande, 4 pumps venti)
Top with whipped cream (optional)

Start with a strawberries and creme Frappuccino
Add Vanilla Bean powder
Add Java Chips
Add a whole Banana (note the extra cost)
Top with whipped cream and mocha drizzle
Top with caramel drizzle if desired
